trans-unit.source: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a ação de linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala (SSML) a ser executada na renderização de um determinado <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> represents requests for servicing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> representa as solicitações de serviço um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: The actions correspond closely to elements in the SSML specification and are implemented on the text returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: As ações intimamente correspondem a elementos na especificação do SSML e são implementadas no texto retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> propriedade em um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor associado com um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> é retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Processing of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property is handled by a speech synthesizes implementation of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a class derived from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: O processamento do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade é tratada por uma fala sintetiza implementação do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> método em uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de uma implementação de síntese de fala personalizado herdando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e use-o de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias e cria uma nova matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias a serem passados para o `Speak` método em um mecanismo de síntese subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is Speak, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por encontrado valor de enumeração do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instância é fala, a implementação

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Converte Americanism para Britishisms no texto a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> event type, an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> fornecidos para o suporte de implementação de interfaces de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> tipo de evento de um evento para um medidor de progresso do sintetizador de unidade é criado.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de processamento de fala é chamado com a modificação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Indica que <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> deve ser usado como o conteúdo de um indicador.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<mark>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde do `<mark>` marca XML na especificação SSML.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Indica que nenhuma ação foi determinada da entrada SSML.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.
trans-unit.target: O associado <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> é uma marca de XML não faz parte do padrão SSML desconhecida.

trans-unit.source: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Essa entrada que pode ser interpretada ou ignorada pelo critério de um mecanismo de síntese.

trans-unit.source: Requests that input <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> text be interpreted as phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Solicitações de entrada <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> texto ser interpretado como fonemas.

trans-unit.source: Exact pronunciation is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Pronúncia exata é especificada pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> membro do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade em <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Phoneme>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde do `<Phoneme>` marca XML na especificação SSML.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> contains no text to be rendered as speech.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> não contém texto a ser renderizado como fala.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the silence is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> member of the he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Durante a latência é especificado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> membro o he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Silence>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde do `<Silence>` marca XML na especificação SSML.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the associated <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> should be processed and spoken.
trans-unit.target: Solicita que o associado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> devem ser processados e falado.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>,
trans-unit.target: Este é o valor padrão de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> para um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>,

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<speak>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corresponde do `<speak>` marca XML na especificação SSML

trans-unit.source: Indicates that text values provided by a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> through its <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak" /> property are to be synthesize as individual characters.
trans-unit.target: Indica que os valores de texto fornecida por um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> por meio de seu <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak" /> propriedade devem ser sintetizar como caracteres individuais.

trans-unit.source: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.
trans-unit.target: Esse processamento inclui pontuação, que não seja espaço em branco, bem como texto alfanumérico.

trans-unit.source: For example thee associated text fragment "word!"
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo o associado fragmento de texto "word"!

trans-unit.source: should be synthsized into "w o r d exclamation point".
trans-unit.target: deve ser synthsized em "w o r ponto de exclamação d".

trans-unit.source: Indicates state of paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Indica o estado do parágrafo.

trans-unit.source:
Corresponds to the `

` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target:
Corresponde do `

` marca XML na especificação SSML

trans-unit.source: Indicates start of sentence.
trans-unit.target: Indica o início da frase.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<s>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corresponde do `<s>` marca XML na especificação SSML
